content:
Public channel created by Rick Gleason. Description:

Discussion about celestial navigation plugin improvements.

Github: https://github.com/rgleason/celestial_navigation_pi/tree/improve
Cloudsmith Repository (result of the CI build process):
https://cloudsmith.io/~opencpn/repos/celestial-navigation-beta/packages/?q=2.4.43.3+tarball

Have incremented the plugin as v2.4.43.3 and the builds should land in Cloudsmith in the celestial-navigation-beta repository
here https://cloudsmith.io/~opencpn/repos/celestial-navigation-beta/packages/ if you download the appropriate tarball and install it using Options > Plugins > Import Plugin Tarball, you should be able to test it.
